scripts.build: cd packages/md5-es/ && rimraf build && webpack -p && cd ../sha1-es/ && rimraf build && webpack -p && cd ../sha256-es/ && rimraf build && webpack -p && cd ../sha512-es/ && rimraf build && webpack -p
scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register packages/md5-es/test packages/sha1-es/test packages/sha256-es/test packages/sha512-es/test
